form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: MEDICAL Examination of Applicants for United States Visas, 157

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/15/2023 PLACE MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS BOMBAY FOR UNITED STATES VISAS DATE OF EXAMINATION 10.5.88/86346042 CITY COUNTRY At the request of the American Consul at BOMBAY INDIA NAME AGE SEX EBRAHIM MOHMEDALI KASUBHAI 75 M I certify that on the above date I examined WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY ON V 588166 BOMBAY 14.2.84 I examined specifically for evidence of any of the following conditions: CLASS A: DANGEROUS CONTAGIOUS DISEASES: Chancroid Lymphogranuloma venereum Gonorrhea Syphilis, infectious stage Granuloma inguinale Tuberculosis, active Leprosy, infectious MENTAL CONDITIONS: Mental retardation Previous occurrence of one or more Mental defect (mental deficiency) attacks of insanity Narcotic drug addiction Insanity Psychopathic personality Chronic alcoholism Sexual deviation (See proviso, sec. 34.7, USPHS Regs.) CLASS B: Physical Defect, Disease, or Disability Serious in Degree or Permanent in Nature Amounting to a Substantial Departure from Normal Physical Well-Being. CLASS C: Minor Conditions. (CHECK NUMBER (1) BELOW OR COMPLETE NUMBER (2)) My examination, including the X-ray and other reports below, revealed: (1) No defect, disease, or disability. (2) Defect, disease, or disability, or previous occurrence of one or more attacks of insanity, as follows (give class-A, B, or C-diagnosis, and pertinent details*): Moderate deafness Chest X-ray report NO PULMONARY ON PLEURAL LESION SEEN. Dr. M. Tayabali from Dr. Blood serological report KAHN TEST: NEGATIVE MTV (III) ANTIBODIES from Dr. DR. (MRS.) F. E. PALIA NOT DETECTED. Other special report(s) (when needed) Dr. B. M. Meher-Homji from Dr. SIGNATURE OF MEDICAL TECHNICAL ADVISOR TITLE DATE OF FINAL REPORT MEDICAL EXAMINER 12.5.88 50157-102 *Continue on reverse side if necessary. OPTIONAL FORM 157 (Rev. 5-78) U.S. GOVERNMENT PRINTING OFFICE : 1984 O - 443-720 Dept. of State
